summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Legenddary eBook platform import features. All requested P0 features are working correctly - Create Book flow without auth issues, token refresh, Import Center with all features (batch/url/drive/smart-paste), and chapter reorder endpoint.

issues: Console warning: Missing Description or aria-describedby for DialogContent - accessibility improvement needed

critical_code_review_comments: Minor console warning about duplicate tiptap 'underline' extension in BookEditor - not blocking but should be cleaned up
DialogContent accessibility warning - add aria-describedby attribute
seed_data_creation: Created test user and test book during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Import Center features fully tested. All tabs (Batch Upload, URL Import, Google Drive, Smart Paste) working. Token refresh flow working. Book creation from dashboard working. Chapter reorder endpoint working. No 404 errors on any import endpoints.

P0_create_book_flow.details: Registration, login, create book from dashboard, redirect to editor - all working without 401 regressions

auth_token_refresh.details: Token refresh endpoint working, protected routes retry on 401 with refreshed token

batch_import_endpoint.details: /api/import/batch accepts files and returns sections (requires auth, not 404)

url_import_endpoint.details: /api/import/url handles general URLs and Google Drive links

google_drive_import.details: Google Drive URL parsing implemented, returns meaningful responses

add_imported_sections_to_book.details: Import Center shows Create New Book and Add to Existing Book buttons after import

notes: All previously 404 endpoints are now working correctly. The app.include_router(api_router) fix resolved the import route registration issue.
